name: @elfa-ai/sdk
description: Official TypeScript SDK for Elfa API v2 - Social intelligence for crypto

scripts.update-schema: curl -o swagger.json https://staging.elfa-docs.pages.dev/swagger/swagger.json && echo 'Schema updated. Run npm run generate-types to regenerate TypeScript definitions.'
scripts.check-schema-updates: curl -s https://staging.elfa-docs.pages.dev/swagger/swagger.json | diff swagger.json - || echo 'Schema changes detected. Run npm run update-schema to update.'
scripts.generate-types: echo 'Type generation script needed - see AGENT.md for implementation details'
scripts.validate-schema: echo 'Schema validation script needed - see AGENT.md for implementation details'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint

author: Elfa Team
